basic.description: A detailed study of major 19th century writers after 1848. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests.Given jointly with FREN 423/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: La littérature française de 1848 à 1900

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites   6.0 units from FREN212 or FREN220 or FREN221 and registration in a FREN Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN323; FREN423.
